age_range.evidence: Participant states they are a 1st year PhD student.

gender.evidence: Participant's language and interests (e.g., hair and eye supplements, aesthetics) suggest a female identity.

location.evidence: Participant explicitly states they live in Boston.

occupation.evidence: Participant explicitly states they are a 1st year PhD student in computer science.

education.evidence: Participant states they are a 1st year PhD student.

goals_and_motivations.value: Maintain health and wellness, pursue academic research, explore new technologies.
goals_and_motivations.evidence: Participant expresses interest in supplements (fish oil), desire to 'maintain micro,' and interest in human-AI collaboration.

interests.evidence: Participant’s research focus, mentions of AI, frequent references to technology, interest in supplements, and recreational activities.

values.evidence: Prioritizes delivery speed and convenience in shopping, seeks information to improve health, and expresses a desire to learn new things.

frequency_of_use.evidence: Participant buys items like tissue and fish oil, suggesting regular replenishment of necessities.

where_used_devices.evidence: Participant checks orders on their app, browsing and purchasing via mobile devices.

search_style_best_vs_first.evidence: Participant primarily focuses on the top-ranked products when searching for items like fish oil.

price_preference_cheapest_vs_expensive.evidence: Participant states they 'try to search for lower price options' when buying necessities.

decision_factors.evidence: Highlights delivery speed and price as primary factors, mentions checking reviews and considering friend’s recommendations.

preferred_categories.evidence: Specifically purchases fish oil and mentions buying tissues and shower gels.

pain_points_and_or_challenges.value: Information overload from sponsored products, potential confusion regarding product quality.
pain_points_and_or_challenges.evidence: Expresses annoyance with sponsored products and a desire to filter out irrelevant information.
